1590060.name: Sigma Draconis Demo
1590060.description: This is the demo for Sigma Draconis, a sci-fi colony building game which focuses on building and resource management.  The demo allows you to play on one of the two regions available in the full game, with a limited set of buildings as research is disabled.  Steam achievements are also disabled.  The demo offers around 1-2 hours of gameplay, and games started in the demo can be continued in the full game.
